boombox_redirect.info: Boombox is a creative toolbox for serious publishers brought to you by the same team who brought you Qzzr.  It contains a bevy of world-class engagement tools (including Qzzr).  Great for teams, Boombox allows you to share, re-purpose, and collaborate on the same pool of creations.
boombox_redirect.subtitle: Qzzr Enterprise is now Boombox.
boombox_redirect.summary: Because you believed in us through Qzzr, we're upgrading you (at no extra charge) as an expression of our gratitude.
boombox_redirect.title: Crank up the volume!

create_dropdown.checkbox_quiz_sublabel: ex. How New Yorker are you?
create_dropdown.list_sublabel: ex. Top 13 Wigs from The Americans
create_dropdown.multi_poll_sublabel: ex. John, Paul, Ringo, or George?
create_dropdown.numbered_list_sublabel: ex. Top 10 films of the decade
create_dropdown.onboarding_outcome_quiz_sublabel: ex. Which character from Full House Are you?
create_dropdown.onboarding_graded_quiz_sublabel: ex. The World’s Hardest Harry Potter Quiz

organization.change_roles_ad_label: Lock down access & change roles in your organization
organization.confirm_role_change: Are you sure you want to change your role?
organization.changing_role_owner_to_admin: Changing your role to an Admin will make it so you can’t see billing info.
organization.changing_role_owner_to_contributor: Changing your role to a Collaborator will make it so you can’t see billing info, or change others' roles.
organization.changing_role_admin_to_contributor: Changing your role to a Collaborator will make it so you can't change others' roles.
organization.lose_access: You will lose access to all organization content.
organization.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove yourself from the organization?

dashboard.boombox_ad_text_pollcaster: Create polls and quizzes in one place and collaborate with your team.
dashboard.boombox_ad_text_qzzr: Create quizzes and polls in one place and collaborate with your team.
dashboard.boombox_ad_text: Create, share, re-purpose, and collaborate on all your content in one place.

sidebar_ad_label.qzzr: Create quizzes and polls in one place and collaborate with your team.

dashboard.create_first: Create your first poll. It's fast and easy.
dashboard.create_org_text_1: Creating your organization will move all your billing information to your organization.
dashboard.create_org_text_2: Owners on your organization will be able to view, and edit this information.
dashboard.create_org_text_3: You will be made the first owner of the organization.
dashboard.empty_search_suggestions_spelling: Make sure all words are spelled correctly.
dashboard.leads_description: Learn about some of the premium features that are available for Pro and Enterprise accounts.
dashboard.qzzr_ad_text: Want to create a quiz instead? Try Qzzr.
dashboard.remove_person_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this person? They will lose access to all organizational content.

dashboard.side_link_organizations_allow: Collaborate with multiple people on the same interactive content
dashboard.tips_description: Get tips and strategies to help you make quizzes like the experts at BuzzFeed.
dashboard.tips_poll_tour: Take a tour of our poll editor
dashboard.tips_quiz_tour: Take a tour of our quiz editor

tour_description.boombox: Take a tour of Boombox in this six-minute video to discover everything you can do with your new account.
tour_description.pollcaster: In this two-minute video you’ll learn some tips on creating a poll and embedding it on your site.
tour_description.qzzr: Take a tour of Qzzr in this six-minute video to discover everything you can do with your new account.

dashboard.webinar_description: Watch this webinar for the tips and strategies that will help you get the most out of your polls.

zero_state_sub_header.boombox: Create a quiz, poll, or list. It's fast and easy.

zero_state_sub_header.qzzr: Create your first quiz. It's fast and easy.

zero_state_welcome_description.pollcaster: Take a tour in this six-minute video to discover everything you can do with your new account, or start your first poll with the %{icon} in the lower right corner.

social.boombox-description: Make your own quizzes and other interactive content for free on Boombox.
social.caption: Made with Qzzr
social.description: Make your own quizzes for free on Qzzr, the world's simplest quiz tool.

sharing.title: Vote now: %{title}
sharing.poll_description_default: Vote to see how you compare to the rest of the world.
sharing.poll_twitter_title_default: Vote now: %{title}. See how you compare to the rest of the world.
sharing.list_description: Make your own lists for free on BOOMBOX, the world's most engaging content platform.

stats.export_success: We'll email you a CSV file shortly
stats.export_fail: An error exporting your data occurred, please try again later
stats.offer_conversions_tooltip: Number of times a person clicked through the custom link at the end of the quiz.
stats.lead_conversions_tooltip: Number of times the form at the end of the quiz was filled in and submitted.
stats.times_taken_tooltip: Number of people who have started the quiz.
stats.avg_time_spent_tooltip: Average amount of time people who completed the quiz have spent, from start to completion. The nature of averages can be skewed by outliers.
stats.form_conversions_tootip: Number of times the form at the end of the quiz was filled in and submitted.
stats.link_conversions_tooltip: Number of times a person clicked through the custom link at the end of the quiz.
stats.facebook_likes_tooltip: Number of people who liked your Facebook page at the end of the quiz.
stats.completion_rates_tooltip: Percentage of people who started and then completed the quiz.
stats.activity_over_time_tooltip: Number of people taking your quiz over time.
stats.score_distribution_tooltip: Percentage breakdown of how a question was answered. On graded quizzes, the percentage who answered correct is also shown.
stats.completion_rate_tooltip: Percentage of people who started and then completed the quiz.
stats.views_tooltip: Number of times the quiz was loaded.
stats.shares_tooltip: Number of times a share button on the widget was pressed.
stats.starts_tooltip: Number of times the quiz was first engaged with.
stats.completions_tooltip: Number of unique times the final question in a quiz was answered.

question_breakdown.no_questions: No questions found, add questions to your quiz.
